name: microsoft-onedrive
label: Microsoft OneDrive
description: OneDrive is a cloud storage and file synchronization service developed by Microsoft. It allows users to store their files and documents securely in the cloud, making them accessible from various devices with an internet connection. OneDrive integrates seamlessly with Microsoft Office applications, enabling users to create, edit, and collaborate on documents in real time. It offers features such as automatic backup of photos and videos from mobile devices, file sharing with others, version history for documents, and the ability to access files offline.

fields.title: Get Access Token
options: On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions
fields.name: auth_type
fields.description: Select the method using which you will get access tokens used to access the Azure WAF APIs.

Without a User - Application Permissions.title: Server URL
Without a User - Application Permissions.name: resource
Without a User - Application Permissions.description: The service-based URI to connect and perform the automated operations.

Without a User - Application Permissions.title: Client ID
Without a User - Application Permissions.name: client_id
Without a User - Application Permissions.description: Unique API ID of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

Without a User - Application Permissions.title: Client Secret
Without a User - Application Permissions.name: client_secret
Without a User - Application Permissions.description: Unique API Secret of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

Without a User - Application Permissions.title: Tenant ID
Without a User - Application Permissions.name: tenant_id
Without a User - Application Permissions.description: ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.

Without a User - Application Permissions.title: Verify SSL
Without a User - Application Permissions.name: verify_ssl
Without a User - Application Permissions.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.title: Server URL
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.name: resource
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.description: The service-based URI to connect and perform the automated operations.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.title: Client ID
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.name: client_id
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.description: Unique API ID of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.title: Client Secret
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.name: client_secret
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.description: Unique API Secret of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.title: Tenant ID
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.name: tenant_id
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.description: ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.title: Auth Code
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.name: code
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.tooltip: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.description: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.title: Redirect URL
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.name: redirect_url
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri you registered in the app registration portal.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.title: Verify SSL
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.name: verify_ssl
On behalf of User - Delegate Permissions.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Folder
operations.description: This action Creates a new folder or DriveItem in a Drive with a specified parent item or path.

parameters.name: associated_with
parameters.title: Associated With
parameters.tooltip: Specify Whether You want to create Folder in a Drive via Drive ID or Find Drive by it's User ID.
parameters.description: Specify Whether You want to create Folder in a Drive via Drive ID or Find Drive by it's User ID.

Drive.name: d_id
Drive.title: Drive ID
Drive.tooltip: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.
Drive.description: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.

User.name: u_id
User.title: User ID
User.tooltip: Specify the unique User identifier associated with the Drive.
User.description: Specify the unique User identifier associated with the Drive.

parameters.name: folder_structure
parameters.title: Folder Structure
parameters.tooltip: Specify a JSON representation of the DriveItem Folder to create in the Drive.
parameters.description: Specify a JSON representation of the DriveItem Folder to create in the Drive.

parameters.name: parent_item_id
parameters.title: Parent Item ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Folder Path to which you want to create Folder in Drive Resource. Ex root:/FolderA
parameters.description: Specify the Folder Path to which you want to create Folder in Drive Resource. Ex root:/FolderA

operations.title: Get User OneDrive
operations.description: Retrieve the properties and relationships of a User's Drive resource.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.title: User ID or Principal Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the identifier for the user object who owns the OneDrive. It can be fetched from the User Section in Azure AD.
parameters.description: Specify the identifier for the user object who owns the OneDrive. It can be fetched from the User Section in Azure AD.

operations.title: Get Document Library
operations.description: This action fetches the access to a Group's or Site's default Document library.

parameters.name: select_option
parameters.title: Associated With
parameters.tooltip: Specify Whether You want to Fetch Document Library that is Associated with A Group or from a Site defined in Azure AD.
parameters.description: Specify Whether You want to Fetch Document Library that is Associated with A Group or from a Site defined in Azure AD.

Group.name: g_id
Group.title: Group ID
Group.tooltip: Specify the Identifier for the group which owns the document library.. It can be fetched from the Group Section in Azure AD.
Group.description: Specify the Identifier for the group which owns the document library.. It can be fetched from the Group Section in Azure AD.

Site.name: s_id
Site.title: Site ID
Site.tooltip: Specify the Identifier for the Site which owns the document library.. It can be fetched from the Sites Section in Azure AD.
Site.description: Specify the Identifier for the Site which owns the document library.. It can be fetched from the Sites Section in Azure AD.

operations.title: Get Drive By ID
operations.description: Retrieves the Properties and relationships of Drive Resource by Drive ID.

parameters.name: drive_id
parameters.title: Drive ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.
parameters.description: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.

operations.title: List Drives
operations.description: Retrieve the list of Drive resources available for a target.

operations.title: Download File
operations.description: Download the contents of the primary stream (file) of a DriveItem. Only driveItems with the file property can be downloaded.

parameters.name: associated_with
parameters.title: Associated With
parameters.tooltip: Specify Whether You want to Download Items in a Drive via Drive ID or Find Drive by it's User ID.
parameters.description: Specify Whether You want to Download Items in a Drive via Drive ID or Find Drive by it's User ID.

Drive.name: d_id
Drive.title: Drive ID
Drive.tooltip: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.
Drive.description: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.

User.name: u_id
User.title: User ID
User.tooltip: Specify the unique User identifier associated with the Drive.
User.description: Specify the unique User identifier associated with the Drive.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.title: Item ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of Item inside the Drive resource that you want to Download.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of Item inside the Drive resource that you want to Download.

operations.title: Upload File
operations.description: This simple upload API allows you to provide the contents of a new file and then upload it to the provided Path on the OneDrive.This method only supports files up to 4MB in size.

parameters.name: associated_with
parameters.title: Associated With
parameters.tooltip: Specify Whether You want to Download Items in a Drive via Drive ID or Find Drive by it's User ID.
parameters.description: Specify Whether You want to Download Items in a Drive via Drive ID or Find Drive by it's User ID.

Drive.name: d_id
Drive.title: Drive ID
Drive.tooltip: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.
Drive.description: Specify the unique Drive identifier for the drive requested.

User.name: u_id
User.title: User ID
User.tooltip: Specify the unique User identifier associated with the Drive.
User.description: Specify the unique User identifier associated with the Drive.

parameters.name: input
parameters.title: Type
parameters.tooltip: Select a method of file submission to GitGuardian for analysis. You can select from following options: (Attachment ID, File IRI)
parameters.description: Select a method of file submission to GitGuardian for analysis. You can select from following options: (Attachment ID, File IRI)

parameters.name: value
parameters.title: Reference ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify a reference ID to access the attachment metadata from FortiSOAR™'s Attachments module. If you have selected Attachment ID, this defaults to the {{vars.attachment_id}} value. If you have selected File IRI, then this defaults to the {{vars.file_iri}} value.
parameters.description: Specify a reference ID to access the attachment metadata from FortiSOAR™'s Attachments module. If you have selected Attachment ID, this defaults to the {{vars.attachment_id}} value. If you have selected File IRI, then this defaults to the {{vars.file_iri}} value.

parameters.name: parent_item_id
parameters.title: Parent Item ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Folder Path to which you want to Upload Item in Drive Resource. Ex root:/FolderA
parameters.description: Specify the Folder Path to which you want to Upload Item in Drive Resource. Ex root:/FolderA

parameters.name: filename
parameters.title: File Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Name of the File which is to be Uploaded.
parameters.description: Specify the Name of the File which is to be Uploaded.
